verses.verse: ( A Greeting from Jude) ( ( 660 1:1 )) Ἰούδας <WG2455> Ioudas Jude , Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou of Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ δοῦλος <WG1401> doulos a servant ἀδελφὸς <WG80> adelphos a brother δὲ <WG1161> de and Ἰακώβου <WG2385> Iakōbou of James , Τοῖς <WG3588> Tois To those who [are] ἐν <WG1722> en by Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God Πατρὶ <WG3962> Patri [the] Father , ἠγαπημένοις <WG25> ēgapēmenois loved καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou in Jesus Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ : τετηρημένοις <WG5083> tetērēmenois kept κλητοῖς <WG2822> klētois called ,
Ἔλεος <WG1656> Eleos Mercy , ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you . καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἰρήνη <WG1515> eirēnē peace , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀγάπη <WG26> agapē love πληθυνθείη <WG4129> plēthyntheiē be multiplied

( God’s Judgment on the Ungodly) ( ( 680 3:1-7 )) Ἀγαπητοί <WG27> Agapētoi Beloved , πᾶσαν <WG3956> pasan every σπουδὴν <WG4710> spoudēn effort ποιούμενος <WG4160> poioumenos [although] I made γράφειν <WG1125> graphein to write ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you περὶ <WG4012> peri about τῆς <WG3588> tēs the κοινῆς <WG2839> koinēs share , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn we σωτηρίας <WG4991> sōtērias salvation ἀνάγκην <WG318> anankēn it necessary ἔσχον <WG2192> eschon I felt γράψαι <WG1125> grapsai to write ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you παρακαλῶν <WG3870> parakalōn [and] urge ἐπαγωνίζεσθαι <WG1864> epagōnizesthai to contend earnestly τῇ <WG3588> tē for the ἅπαξ <WG530> hapax once for all παραδοθείσῃ <WG3860> paradotheisē entrusted τοῖς <WG3588> tois to the ἁγίοις <WG40> hagiois saints . πίστει <WG4102> pistei faith

παρεισέδυσαν* <WG3921> pareisedysan have crept in [among you] unnoticed — γάρ <WG1063> gar For τινες <WG5100> tines certain ἄνθρωποι <WG444> anthrōpoi men οἱ <WG3588> hoi - πάλαι <WG3819> palai long ago προγεγραμμένοι <WG4270> progegrammenoi who were designated εἰς <WG1519> eis for τοῦτο <WG3778> touto - τὸ <WG3588> to - κρίμα <WG2917> krima condemnation . ἀσεβεῖς <WG765> asebeis ungodly [ones] τὴν <WG3588> tēn the τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our χάριτα <WG5485> charita grace μετατιθέντες <WG3346> metatithentes They turn εἰς <WG1519> eis into ἀσέλγειαν <WG766> aselgeian a license for immorality , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὸν <WG3588> ton - μόνον <WG3441> monon only Δεσπότην <WG1203> Despotēn Master καὶ <WG2532> kai and Κύριον <WG2962> Kyrion Lord , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our Ἰησοῦν <WG2424> Iēsoun Jesus Χριστὸν <WG5547> Christon Christ . ἀρνούμενοι <WG720> arnoumenoi they deny

Ὑπομνῆσαι <WG5279> Hypomnēsai to remind δὲ <WG1161> de vvv ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you βούλομαι <WG1014> boulomai I want εἰδότας <WG1492> eidotas Although you are fully aware of this ‹ὑμᾶς› <WG4771> hymas . . . ἅπαξ <WG530> hapax . . . «πάντα <WG3956> panta . . . , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that Ἰησοῦς» <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus ( NE, WH, BYZ, and TR the Lord) λαὸν <WG2992> laon [His] people ἐκ <WG1537> ek out of γῆς <WG1093> gēs [the] land Αἰγύπτου <WG125> Aigyptou of Egypt , σώσας <WG4982> sōsas had delivered τὸ <WG3588> to - δεύτερον <WG1208> deuteron after τοὺς <WG3588> tous those who μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv πιστεύσαντας <WG4100> pisteusantas did not believe . ἀπώλεσεν <WG622> apōlesen He destroyed

ἀγγέλους <WG32> angelous [the] angels τε <WG5037> te And τοὺς <WG3588> tous who μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv τηρήσαντας <WG5083> tērēsantas did not stay within τὴν <WG3588> tēn [own] ἑαυτῶν <WG1438> heautōn their ἀρχὴν <WG746> archēn domain ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but ἀπολιπόντας <WG620> apolipontas abandoned τὸ <WG3588> to their ἴδιον <WG2398> idion [proper] οἰκητήριον <WG3613> oikētērion dwelling — εἰς <WG1519> eis bound for κρίσιν <WG2920> krisin judgment μεγάλης <WG3173> megalēs on [that] great ἡμέρας <WG2250> hēmeras day . δεσμοῖς <WG1199> desmois chains ἀϊδίοις <WG126> aidiois in eternal ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo under ζόφον <WG2217> zophon darkness , τετήρηκεν <WG5083> tetērēken [these] He has kept

ὡς <WG5613> hōs - Σόδομα <WG4670> Sodoma Sodom καὶ <WG2532> kai and Γόμορρα <WG1116> Gomorra Gomorrah καὶ <WG2532> kai and αἱ <WG3588> hai the περὶ <WG4012> peri around αὐτὰς <WG846> autas them , πόλεις <WG4172> poleis cities τὸν <WG3588> ton - ὅμοιον <WG3664> homoion In like τρόπον <WG5158> tropon manner τούτοις <WG3778> toutois . . . , ἐκπορνεύσασαι <WG1608> ekporneusasai who indulged in sexual immorality καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀπελθοῦσαι <WG565> apelthousai pursued ὀπίσω <WG3694> opisō . . . σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos flesh , ἑτέρας <WG2087> heteras strange πρόκεινται <WG4295> prokeintai are on display δεῖγμα <WG1164> deigma as an example πυρὸς <WG4442> pyros fire . αἰωνίου <WG166> aiōniou of eternal δίκην <WG1349> dikēn [the] punishment ὑπέχουσαι <WG5254> hypechousai of those who sustain

Ὁμοίως <WG3668> Homoiōs in the same way μέντοι <WG3305> mentoi Yet καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . οὗτοι <WG3778> houtoi these ἐνυπνιαζόμενοι <WG1797> enypniazomenoi dreamers σάρκα <WG4561> sarka [their] bodies , μὲν <WG3303> men - μιαίνουσιν <WG3392> miainousin defile κυριότητα <WG2963> kyriotēta authority , δὲ <WG1161> de - ἀθετοῦσιν <WG114> athetousin reject δόξας <WG1391> doxas glorious [beings] . δὲ <WG1161> de and βλασφημοῦσιν <WG987> blasphēmousin slander

ὁ <WG3588> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de But [even] Μιχαὴλ <WG3413> Michaēl Michael , ὁ <WG3588> ho the ἀρχάγγελος <WG743> archangelos archangel ὅτε <WG3753> hote when τῷ <WG3588> tō with the διαβόλῳ <WG1228> diabolō devil διακρινόμενος <WG1252> diakrinomenos he disputed διελέγετο <WG1256> dielegeto vvv περὶ <WG4012> peri over τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Μωϋσέως <WG3475> Mōuseōs of Moses , σώματος <WG4983> sōmatos body οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐτόλμησεν <WG5111> etolmēsen did not presume κρίσιν <WG2920> krisin charge against him , ἐπενεγκεῖν <WG2018> epenenkein to bring βλασφημίας <WG988> blasphēmias a slanderous ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen said , Ἐπιτιμήσαι <WG2008> Epitimēsai rebuke σοι <WG4771> soi you !” ( This account is attributed by Origen to the Testament of Moses, also called the Assumption of Moses.) Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios “ [The] Lord

οὗτοι <WG3778> houtoi These [men] , δὲ <WG1161> de however , ὅσα <WG3745> hosa - μὲν <WG3303> men - οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv οἴδασιν <WG1492> oidasin they do not understand , βλασφημοῦσιν <WG987> blasphēmousin slander ὅσα <WG3745> hosa what δὲ <WG1161> de and φυσικῶς <WG5447> physikōs . . . . ὡς <WG5613> hōs like τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἄλογα <WG249> aloga irrational ζῷα <WG2226> zōa animals , ἐπίστανται <WG1987> epistantai they do instinctively ἐν <WG1722> en by τούτοις <WG3778> toutois the things φθείρονται <WG5351> phtheirontai they will be destroyed

οὐαὶ <WG3759> ouai Woe αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them ! ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - τῇ <WG3588> tē the ὁδῷ <WG3598> hodō path τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κάϊν <WG2535> Kain of Cain ; ἐπορεύθησαν <WG4198> eporeuthēsan They have traveled καὶ <WG2532> kai - τῇ <WG3588> tē into the πλάνῃ <WG4106> planē error τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Βαλαὰμ <WG903> Balaam of Balaam ; μισθοῦ <WG3408> misthou headlong ἐξεχύθησαν <WG1632> exechythēsan they have rushed καὶ <WG2532> kai - τῇ <WG3588> tē in ἀντιλογίᾳ <WG485> antilogia rebellion . τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κόρε <WG2879> Kore Korah’s ἀπώλοντο <WG622> apōlonto they have perished

Οὗτοί <WG3778> Houtoi These [men] εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are οἱ <WG3588> hoi - ἐν <WG1722> en in ταῖς <WG3588> tais - ἀγάπαις <WG26> agapais love feasts , ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your σπιλάδες <WG4694> spilades hidden reefs ( Or are blemishes) συνευωχούμενοι <WG4910> syneuōchoumenoi feasting [with you] ἀφόβως <WG870> aphobōs shamelessly ἑαυτοὺς <WG1438> heautous [only] themselves . ποιμαίνοντες <WG4165> poimainontes [but] shepherding νεφέλαι <WG3507> nephelai [They are] clouds ἄνυδροι <WG504> anydroi without water , ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo by ἀνέμων <WG417> anemōn [the] wind ; παραφερόμεναι <WG3911> parapheromenai carried along δένδρα <WG1186> dendra trees φθινοπωρινὰ <WG5352> phthinopōrina in autumn , ἄκαρπα <WG175> akarpa fruitless δὶς <WG1364> dis twice ἀποθανόντα <WG599> apothanonta dead ἐκριζωθέντα <WG1610> ekrizōthenta after being uprooted .

κύματα <WG2949> kymata waves ἄγρια <WG66> agria [They are] wild θαλάσσης <WG2281> thalassēs of [the] sea , ἐπαφρίζοντα <WG1890> epaphrizonta foaming up τὰς <WG3588> tas [own] ἑαυτῶν <WG1438> heautōn their αἰσχύνας <WG152> aischynas shame ; ἀστέρες <WG792> asteres stars , πλανῆται <WG4107> planētai wandering οἷς <WG3739> hois for whom ὁ <WG3588> ho - ζόφος <WG2217> zophos blackest τοῦ <WG3588> tou - σκότους <WG4655> skotous darkness εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv αἰῶνα <WG165> aiōna forever . τετήρηται <WG5083> tetērētai has been reserved

Προεφήτευσεν* <WG4395> Proephēteusen prophesied δὲ <WG1161> de - καὶ <WG2532> kai also τούτοις <WG3778> toutois about them ἕβδομος <WG1442> hebdomos [the] seventh ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Ἀδὰμ <WG76> Adam Adam , Ἑνὼχ <WG1802> Henōch Enoch , λέγων <WG3004> legōn - : Ἰδοὺ <WG2400> Idou “ Behold , ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen is coming Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios [the] Lord ἐν <WG1722> en with ἁγίαις <WG40> hagiais holy [ones] μυριάσιν <WG3461> myriasin myriads αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou of His

ποιῆσαι <WG4160> poiēsai to execute κρίσιν <WG2920> krisin judgment κατὰ <WG2596> kata on πάντων <WG3956> pantōn everyone , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐλέγξαι <WG1651> elenxai to convict πάντας <WG3956> pantas all τοὺς <WG3588> tous the ἀσεβεῖς <WG765> asebeis ungodly περὶ <WG4012> peri of πάντων <WG3956> pantōn every τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἔργων <WG2041> ergōn act ἀσεβείας <WG763> asebeias of wickedness αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn . . . ὧν <WG3739> hōn - ἠσέβησαν <WG764> ēsebēsan ungodly καὶ <WG2532> kai and περὶ <WG4012> peri - πάντων <WG3956> pantōn every τῶν <WG3588> tōn - σκληρῶν <WG4642> sklērōn harsh [word] ὧν <WG3739> hōn - ἐλάλησαν <WG2980> elalēsan spoken κατ’ <WG2596> kat’ against αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him ἁμαρτωλοὶ <WG268> hamartōloi sinners .” ( See the First Book of Enoch (1 Enoch 1:9).) ἀσεβεῖς <WG765> asebeis by ungodly

Οὗτοί <WG3778> Houtoi These [men] εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are γογγυσταί <WG1113> gongystai grumblers , μεμψίμοιροι <WG3202> mempsimoiroi discontented κατὰ <WG2596> kata after τὰς <WG3588> tas [their] ἐπιθυμίας <WG1939> epithymias lusts ; αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn own πορευόμενοι <WG4198> poreuomenoi following καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὸ <WG3588> to - στόμα <WG4750> stoma mouths αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their λαλεῖ <WG2980> lalei spew ὑπέρογκα <WG5246> hyperonka arrogance ; θαυμάζοντες <WG2296> thaumazontes they flatter πρόσωπα <WG4383> prosōpa others ὠφελείας <WG5622> ōpheleias advantage . χάριν <WG5484> charin for their own

Ὑμεῖς <WG4771> Hymeis you , ( A Call to Persevere) δέ <WG1161> de But ἀγαπητοί <WG27> agapētoi beloved , μνήσθητε <WG3403> mnēsthēte remember τῶν <WG3588> tōn what ῥημάτων <WG4487> rhēmatōn vvv τῶν <WG3588> tōn vvv προειρημένων <WG4302> proeirēmenōn was foretold ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo by τῶν <WG3588> tōn the ἀποστόλων <WG652> apostolōn apostles τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And οὓς <WG3739> hous those who μὲν <WG3303> men indeed , ἐλεᾶτε <WG1653> eleate have mercy on διακρινομένους <WG1252> diakrinomenous doubt ;

‹οὓς <WG3739> hous others δὲ› <WG1161> de - σῴζετε <WG4982> sōzete save ἐκ <WG1537> ek from πυρὸς <WG4442> pyros [the] fire ; ἁρπάζοντες <WG726> harpazontes by snatching [them] οὓς <WG3739> hous to still others δὲ <WG1161> de and ἐλεᾶτε <WG1653> eleate show mercy ἐν <WG1722> en [ tempered ] with φόβῳ <WG5401> phobō fear , μισοῦντες <WG3404> misountes hating καὶ <WG2532> kai even τὸν <WG3588> ton the ἀπὸ <WG575> apo by τῆς <WG3588> tēs the σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos flesh . ἐσπιλωμένον <WG4695> espilōmenon stained χιτῶνα <WG5509> chitōna clothing
